sentences: Ta jooksis minu k√§tt, kuid ma ajasin teda maha.
Loomulikult ajasin see film juba mitu korda vaataja.
Kui sa mind ei kuula, siis ma algin sind ajama.
context: 'Ajasin' is the past tense of 'ajada', meaning to chase or run after someone/something. It can be used literally for physical chasing or metaphorically in a playful context.
